title: Nemesis draft is up?
body: Is it meant to be? lol. (like yet? hasn't been announced that its on yet).

replies.body: Just a note, when I made this post there hadn't been an announcement yet and now there has been...
Yes, but I wanted to play it as soon as it was up, as with every featured game mode. Luckily enough I now have time for one game.
Fun with friends. Pretty meh otherwise. Ends up like 4 supports on each side.
its up and im playing it!
